Summary: Triangle over ranch home approximate size of house
divs: sighting detailsi was driving home from a city meeting in the fall\winter and noticed an object above a neighboring house (one street up from mine). i wondered what a helicopter was doing this time of night over a neighborhood, so i turned off the radio, rolled down the window and drove slowly past the object - it was a dark triangle with milky-white lights on each tip and made no noise. the object was a little smaller than the roof of the house it was hovering above. i kept my eyes fixed on the object and drove slowly past it and into my driveway. the location is approximately 7 miles to the st. louis airport and 1\2 mile off of interstate 70. later, on a trip in germany, a student was talking in the bus and described the exact thing i had seen in my neighborhood only over route 3 between waterloo\columbia, illinois on his way to work.
